title: Humongous Skyrim Texture Pack (From Texture Pack Combiner)
description:
** PLEASE SEED!  

Humongous Skyrim Texture Pack
-----------------------------
This blend of upgraded Skyrim textures was crated with the "Texture Pack Combiner" with nearly all it's possible texture mods installed.  There where a few redundant mods that were left out.  I also left out any mods that required .esp's or .bsa's etc.

This mod consists ONLY of a "Textures" and "Meshes" folder.  No *.esp files.  No .bsa files, etc...  Should be compatible with all other mods, especially if this is installed first.

REQUIREMENTS
------------

I personally run this on an I5 quad core with 8 gigs of system memory.  I use ENB Series (RealVision) with ENBoost to manage the memory on my GeForce GTX 650 ti with TWO gigs of video memory.

The important requirement here is 2 gigs of video ram.  Skyrim's graphics engine has a memory limit of 3 point something odd...  If you exceed the limit the game will crash.

** WARNING ** If you don't have at least 2 gigs of video ram to displace the size of these textures, the game will crash.

** WARNING ** While these textures will perform very well on any modern video board, they are large files and will take time to load into memory.  As a result, your game will look and run great...  But your loading times will be drastically increased.  (A Solid State Drive my help with this)

INSTALLATION
------------

You can probably add the .zip file directly to Nexus Mod Manager and install from there.  However, I simply installed these manually and then used NMM for other stuff.

To Manually Install, simply unzip the "Textures" and "Meshes" folders to the "Data" folder on your Skyrim Installation.  (Most likely C:Program Files X86SteamSteamAppsCommonSkyrimData)

You will most likely be asked to merge to existing folders and overwrite some files.  Answer "Yes" to all.

List of Individual Mods Included
--------------------------------

This texture pack is a blend of the following mods.

Skyrim HD - 2K Textures
Serious HD Retexture Skyrim
Skyrim Realistic Overhaul
AOF Detailed Mountains
AOF Farmhouses
Ash Pile Retex
Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack
Bryce Nebula - Skyrim Galaxy Replacer
Designs of the Nords
Detailed Chests
Detailed Rugs
Dwemer Metal Retexture
Enhanced Distant Terrain
HD Misc
HD Ore and Ingots
HD Sacks Retexture
HD Soul Gems
Hectrol Caves Deluxe HighRes Retex
High Definition Ivy
High Quality Food and Ingredients
High Quality Workbench
HQ Papaer
HQ Skyrim Map V2
HQ Towns and Villages
Hybrids HD Plants and Herbs Retexture
No Stretching
Quality SnowFlakes V2
Real Ice and Snow
Realistic Instruments
Realistic Smoke and Embers
Riften HQ Textures
Ruins Clutter Improved
Septim HD
Silly Level of Detail - Potions and Poisons
Silly Level of Detail - Wine Cellar
Skyrim Sunglare V4
Snow and Rocks Textures HD
Tobes Highres Textures
TreesHD Skyrim Variation
Weathered Road Signs

( 40 Count !! )  <Eye Candy Alert>

Recommendations
---------------

Install a clean un-modded copy of Skyrim. (On an SSD if you can)  Manually Copy the Textures and Meshes folders from this pack into the Data folder of your clean Skyrim Installation.  Overwrite all files.

Now.  Use Nexus Mod Manager or Steam Workshop to mod other things.  Install SkyUI, Bags and Bandoliers, Cloaks of Skyrim, Immersive Weapons, Immersive Armors, and maybe the aMidianBorn texture packs for Immersive Weapons and Armor.  Etc Etc.  Have Fun!

** PLEASE SEED!  My Upload speed sucks, so I need ya to seed a bit.  Thanks 'N' Stuff.
